#BlackMagicCraft #Episode185

In this episode I demonstrate how you can use common food packaging cardstock to make great looking wood siding for terrain, dioramas, dollhouses, or whatever miniature hobby you may be into.

title: Use Cardstock Packaging to Make Miniature Wood Siding
